title: Loess Plateau Regeneration Parameters
description: Parameter set for REGv1 solver calibrated to Loess Plateau vegetation-SOM-moisture feedbacks (1995-2010)
scientific_basis: Edison Research Specification - Loess Plateau Anchors

r_V.source: Remote-sensing cover dynamics; greening stabilization within a few years after planting (1999-2002)

lambda1.source: Regional water-yield decrease with greening ~1-1.6 mm/yr
lambda1.note: Controls how soil moisture above theta_star promotes vegetation growth

lambda2.source: SOM coupling prior; to be refined with chronosequences
lambda2.note: Controls how SOM above SOM_star promotes vegetation growth

theta_star.description: Critical soil moisture threshold for vegetation growth activation
theta_star.source: Semi-arid loess soil moisture thresholds; to be refined against runoff responses

SOM_star.description: Critical SOM threshold for positive feedback lock-in
SOM_star.source: Lock-in threshold consistent with rapid early accumulation then stabilization

a1.description: SOM input rate per unit vegetation cover
a1.source: Plateau SOC sequestration ~0.712 Tg C/yr scaled by area and ΔV
a1.note: Rapid SOC input in early restoration decades (strong increase first ~10-23 yr)

eta1.description: Water holding capacity gain per % SOM increase
eta1.source: Retention gain per % SOM; to be regressed from infiltration/soil-moisture experiments
eta1.note: Hydrological bonus: +1% SOM → +5mm water holding capacity

K_vertical_multiplier.description: Compounding multiplier for vertical conductivity per % SOM increase
K_vertical_multiplier.note: Hydrological bonus: +1% SOM → 15% increase in K_zz (compounding)

dt_typical.description: Typical timestep for regeneration cascade solver (slow timescale)

call_frequency.description: REGv1 called once every 128 HYD-RLv1 steps

loess_plateau_sanity_check.description: 20-year simulation from degraded to regenerated state

expected_final_state.trajectory: Sigmoid curve with inflection around year 8-12

references.pqac-00000002: Vegetation vs bare slope runoff/infiltration experiments
